data.name: World of Tanks Blitz - Warhammer Skulls Pack
data.detailed_description:
Here's a special bundle to commemorate Warhammer Skulls 2022!

The Predator Ultramarines is a dynamic heavy tank equipped with a quick-firing gun featuring a 3-shell magazine. The combination of fast turret, small dispersion after firing, and well-balanced armor makes the Predator UM a formidable opponent for enemy tanks.

The Vindicator Ultramarines is a tank destroyer equipped with a large-caliber gun boasting high single-shot damage. Its solid frontal armor features additional protection in the form of a daunting dozer blade.

Take command of these Legion vehicles and lead your team to victory!

This bundle includes:

• Predator UM
• Vindicator UM
• 2 Garage slots
• 9 equipment slots for each vehicle
• 15 certificates for x5 XP for the Predator UM
• 15 certificates for x5 XP for the Vindicator UM
• Themed profile background
• Imperial Aquila Legendary avatar
• Primaris Intercessor Legendary avatar

data.short_description: Celebrate the Warhammer Skulls Festival with a special bundle featuring the large-caliber Vindicator and the heavy Predator, both bearing the colors of the Ultramarines Legion! Take command of these Legion vehicles and lead your team to victory!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Czech*, Finnish*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.0, 8.1, 10 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compliant video card with 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mac OS X 10.9 supported models: https://support.apple.com/kb/SP702
